item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "I have decided that maybe I want to write when I grow up. I just don't know what I would write." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "I think that if I ever have kids, and they are upset, I won't tell them that people are starving in China or anything like that because it wouldn't change the fact that they were upset. And even if somebody else has it much worse, that doesn't really change the fact that you have what you have." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy
item.description: "We are the music makers, and we are the dreamers of dreams." -- Arthur William Edgar O'Shaughnessy

item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Kaitlin add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You must stay drunk on writing so reality cannot destroy you." -- Ray Bradbury
